idea-plugin.name: Duplicate Lines
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin lets you duplicate the entire selected lines, not just down (built-in action), but also up. In both cases, unlike the built-in action, it will preserve the original selection after the duplication.


Supports single lines, multiple selected lines, multiple carets and block selection.


Default shortcuts are "Shift + Ctrl + Alt + Up/Down" and "Shift + Command + Option + Up/Down" for macOS.
